RunCommandsOnlyWhenLive.label: Accept Commands Only When Live
RunCommandsOnlyWhenLive.tooltip: Indicates whether the script only accepts commands while you are live.

CommandPermissions.label: Command Permissions
CommandPermissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use script commands.

CountCommandName.label: Count Command Name
CountCommandName.tooltip: The command name is ! then whatever is in this box.

ResetCommandName.label: Reset Command Name
ResetCommandName.tooltip: The command name is ! then whatever is in this box.

ExerciseType.label: Type of Exercise
ExerciseType.tooltip: Which exercise would you like to have to do after subs?

IncrementAmount.label: Increment Per Sub
IncrementAmount.tooltip: How many exercise reps would you like to do after each sub?

ClientID.label: Twitch Client ID
ClientID.tooltip: Enter the client ID for your registered application.

TwitchOAuthToken.label: Twitch oAuth Token
TwitchOAuthToken.tooltip: Enter an oAuth token that allows the bot to read channel point redemptions on the channel being watched.

btnGetToken.label: Get Token
btnGetToken.tooltip: Generate an oAuth Token for the watched twitch account with permissions to read subscriptions.

EnableResponses.label: Enable Chat Responses
EnableResponses.tooltip: Enable or disable bot responses to flag redemptions.

btnreadme.label: Open Readme
btnreadme._comment: Do not change the function name! Ever!!
